readme:
# daverona-laravel-syntax

A port of Laravel documentation color scheme for Atom

## Preview

![Screenshot](./screenshot.png)

## Installation

To *install* daverona-laravel-syntax, run apm command in a terminal:

```bash
apm install daverona-laravel-syntax
```

To *uninstall* daverona-laravel-syntax, run apm command in a terminal:

```bash
apm uninstall daverona-laravel-syntax
```

## References

* [https://laravel.com/docs/](https://laravel.com/docs/)
* [https://github.com/michaeldyrynda/Laravel.tmTheme](https://github.com/michaeldyrynda/Laravel.tmTheme)
